dark.name: ダーク
dark.description: モダンなダークテーマ
dark.stylesheet_template: QWidget { background-color: {background}; color: {foreground}; } QMainWindow { background-color: {background}; } QMenuBar { background-color: {menu_background}; color: {foreground}; } QToolBar { background-color: {menu_background}; border: none; } QPushButton { background-color: {button_background}; border: 1px solid {border}; color: {foreground}; padding: 5px; } QPushButton:hover { background-color: {button_hover}; } QTreeView, QListView { background-color: {input_background}; color: {foreground}; border: 1px solid {border}; } QTextEdit { background-color: {input_background}; color: {foreground}; border: 1px solid {border}; }
